Amagaju FC vs APR FC

Amagaju FC 1-2 APR FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:26

Umukino urarangiye

Umutoza wa APR FC Zlatko Krmpoti ashyizemo Iranzi Jean Claude mu mwanya wa Nshuti Dominique Savio, umusifuzi ahita ahuha mu ifirimbi Iranzi atarawukoraho. Umukino urangiye APR FC itsindiye Amagaju FC iwayo 2-1

17:22

90' Iminota itatu y'inyongera

17:22

89' APR FC ikomeje kwiharira umukino

Iminota ya nyuma y'umukino APR FC iri guhererekanya neza yima umupira Amagaju FC mu rwego rwo gushaka uko iminota yashira ikegukana amanota atatu

17:15

78' Iminota yo kudohorera abana

Ku bibuga byinshi byo mu ntara iyo iminota 75 igeze imiryango irafungurwa abadafite amafaranga yo kwishyura umukino bakareba iminota 15 ya nyuma. I Nyamagabe bafunguye imiryango ibyo benshi bita Kudohora, hinjira benshi biganjemo abana b'abanyeshuri bahagaze ku muryango wa stade kuva umukino utangiye

17:06

71' Gusimbuza ku mpande zombi

Rutahizamu w'Amagaju FC, Mugisha Josue asimbuwe na Byiringiro Irene naho ku ruhande rwa APR FC, Buteera Andrew asimburwa na Nizeyimana Mirafa

17:01

63' Amagaju FC ari kotsa APR FC igitutu

Ndikumana Tresor acenze abakinnyi bo hagati ba APR FC akorerwa ikosa hagati mu kibuga haboneka coup franc uyu kapiteni w'Amagaju FC ukomoka i Burundi arayiterera ariko umupira ukora kuri Rugwiro ujya muri Koruneri gusa yo ntacyo abakinnyi b'Amagaju FC bayibyaje.

16:54

61' Ikarita y'umuhondo ya mbere kuri APR FC

Imran Nshimiyimana akoreye ikosa Kabura Muhamud hagati mu kibuga, umusifuzi amuzamurira ikarita y'umuhondo. Gusa APR FC iracyayoboye umukino.

16:41

49' Ndikumana Bodo ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Umupira uhinduwe na Dusabe Jean Claude ugera ku kirenga cya Ndikumana Bodo agerageje gutera mu izamu atera ishoti ridafite imbaraga umupira ufatwa na Ntwari Fiacre, ariko umusifuzi anemeza ko Bodo yari yabanje kurarira.

16:38

45' Gusimbuza ku mpande zombi

Umutoza Muhoza Jean Paul akoze impinduka, Uko Emmanuel utitwaye neza mu gice cya mbere atanga umwanya kuri Dusabe Jean Claude, ku rundi ruhande Issa Bigirimana wa APR FC asimburwa na Mugunga Yves.

16:35

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

Ikipe ya APR FC itangije igice cya kabiri cy'umukino, intego ni uguhagarara ku ntsinzi yabonye mu gice cya mbere

16:22

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Iminota 45 ya mbere irangiye Amagaju FC iri mu rugo itsinzwe n APR FC 2-1 mu mukino ubimburira indi yo kwishyura ya shampiyona y'u Rwanda

16:18

42' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI CYA APR FC

APR FC itsinze igitego cya kabiri muri uyu mukino nyuma y'ishoti rikomeye ritewe na Byiringiro Lague, umunyezamu Gadi akuramo umupira ananirwa kuwugumana ugera kuri Imran Nshimiyimana asubiza mu izamu

16:13

37' IGITEGO CYO KWISHYURA CY'AMAGAJU FC

Ikipe y'Amagaju FC yihariye umupira yotsa igitutu izamu rya APR FC, Irambona Fabrice ahinduye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina myugariro Herve Rugwiro awukora n'akaboko bivamo penaliti y'Amagaju FC yinjijwe neza na Ndikumana Tresor ukomoka i Burundi

16:08

32' Kurarira ku ruhande rw'Amagaju FC

Nyuma yo kugundaguranira umupira kwa Ndikumana Tresor na Buteera Andrew bikarangira utwawe na Ndikumana, awuhaye bazina we Ndikumana Bodo asigarana n'umunyezamu Ntwari Fiacre ariko umusifuzi yemeza ko yari yaraririye.

16:00

25' Ikarita ya mbere y'umuhondo ku ruhande rw'Amagaju FC

Uko Nduibuisi Emmanuel akoreye ikosa Issa Bigirimana bimuviramo guhabwa ikarita y'umuhondo ariko coup franc ya APR FC yo ntacyo ibyaye

15:58

23' Byiringiro Lague akorewe ikosa

Nyuma yo guhererekanya neza kwa Ally Niyonzima na Buteera, bahaye umupira Issa Bigirimana nawe udatinze agerageza kuwuha Byiringiro Lague wari imbere y'izamu ariko akorerwa ikosa na Egide Rutayisire. Ubu ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

15:53

16' Umunyezamu wa APR FC akoze ku mupira ku nshuro ya mbere

Ikipe y'Amagaju FC igerageje gusatira ku nshuro ya mbere, Ndikumana Tresor yohereza umupira muremure imbere ashakisha umutwe wa Irambona Fabrice uri guhangana na APR FC yahoze akinira, atera n'umutwe ariko umunyezamu Ntwari Fiacre afata umupira bitamugoye

15:44

08' APR FC iteye mu izamu ku nshuro ya kabiri ariko habayeho kurarira

Issa Bigirimana akorewe ikosa na Rutayisire haboneka coup franc iterwa neza na Nshuti Dominique Savio, umupira awushyira ku mutwe wa Buregeya Prince atera mu izamu ariko umusifuzi yemeza ko yari yaraririye.

15:39

Ni umukino wa mbere ku bakinnyi batatu bafite ubunararibonye basinyiye Amagaju FC

Nyuma yo kubona ko ikipe y'Amagaju FC iri munsi y'umurongo utukura, abayobozi bayo basinyishije abakinnyi bamaze imyaka myinshi muri shampiyona y'u Rwanda; Egide Rutayisire bita Cayi, Ndikumana Bodo, na Kabura Muhamud bamenyekanye muri AS Kigali kuva 2008.

15:36

02' IGITEGO CYA MBERE CYA APR FC

Umupira uzamuhererekanyijwe neza n'abakinnyi ba APR FC bo hagati; Ally Niyonzimana, Imran Nshimiyimana na Buteera, umupira wageze kuri Emmanuel Imanishimwe awucomekera rutahizamu Byiringiro Lague asigarana n'umunyezamu Gadi wenyine, atazuyaje ahita amuhindukiza

15:33

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino utangijwe n'Amagaju FC, rutahizamu Ndikumana Bodo agerageza gutungura izamu rya Ntwari Fiacre ariko umupira uca ku ruhande

15:30

Umukino ugiye gutangira

Amakipe yombi arangije kwishyushya. Agiye gutangira umukino. Abafana si benshi cyane

15:29

Abakinnyi bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku ruhande rw'Amagaju FC

Umunyezamu: Muhawenayo Gadi

Ba myugariro: Bugingo Emmanuel, Usengimana Jean Pierre Ndikumana Tresor na Rutayisire Egide

Abakina hagati:Mugisha Josue, Kabura Muhamud, Uko Nduibuisi Emmanuel

Ba rutahizamu: Ndikumana Bodo na Irambona Fabrice

14:58

Ni umunsi wa mbere ku mutoza mushya n'abakinnyi bashya ba APR FC

Nyuma yo guhabwa amasezerano no gutangazwa ku mugaragaro tariki 7 Gashyantare 2019, umutoza mushya Zlatko Krmpotic ukomoka muri Serbia agiye gutoza umukino wa mbere wa shampiyona, ari kumwe n'abakinnyi bashya barimo Ally Niyonzima

14:52

Amakipe yombi yageze kuri stade Nyagisenyi

APR FC iturutse i Huye aho yaraye mu modoka nziza y'ingabo z'u Rwanda n'Amagaju FC aturutse mu mujyi wa Nyamagabe aho yakoreraga umwiherero, ikipe zombi zageze kuri stade Nyagisenyi ahagiye kubera umukino.

14:41

Abakinnyi bagiye kubanza mu kibuga ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Umunyezamu: Ntwari Fiacre

Ba myugariro: Michel Rusheshangoga (C), Herve Rugwiro, Buregeya Prince na Emmanuel Imanishimwe

Abakina hagati: Ally Niyonzima, Imran Nshimiyimana na Butera Andrew

Ba rutahizamu: Issa Bigirimana, Byiringiro Lague na Dominique Savio Nshuti

14:29

Amagaju FC agiye gukina adafite umunyezamu wa mbere

Usanzwe ari umunyezamu wa mbere w'Amagaju FC, Twagirimana Pacifique, yakoze impanuka ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga kuva muri Mutarama 2019 ni yo mpamvu atari buze kugaragara muri uyu mukino

14:15

Abafana ba APR FC bageze i Nyamagabe hakiri kare

14:12

Ikipe imwe iri ku mwanya wa mbere indi ku wa nyuma

Imikino ibanza APR FC yayisoje ku mwanya wa mbere n'amanota 35 naho Amagaju FC ari ku mwanya wa nyuma n'amanota umunani aho ahatanira kutamanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri aherukamo mu 2007.

14:11

Amagaju FC ntabwo aheruka kwitwara neza imbere ya APR FC

Umukino ubanza wahuje amakipe yombi ikipe ya APR FC yari yatsinze Amagaju ibitego 2-0 bya Savio Nshuti na Muhadjiri Hakizimana utaza gukina uyu mukino.

14:09

APR FC igiye gutangira imikino yo kwishyura yugarijwe nÃ¢â‚¬â„¢imvune

14:08

Ikirere kirakonje!

Umukino ufungura indi ugiye kubera kuri Stade Nyagisenyi yo mu Mujyi wa Nyamagabe mu Ntara yÃ¢â‚¬â„¢Amajyepfo. Ikirere kirakonje gishobora gutanga imvura mu masaha ari imbere.

14:07

IGIHE ibahaye ikaze mu mikino yo kwishyura ya shampiyona

Imikino yo kwishyura ya Shampiyona y'icyiciro cya mbere mu mupira w'amaguru mu Rwanda umwaka w'imikino wa 2018-19 yatangiye kuri uyu munsi, ikipe ya APR FC igiye gusura Amagaju FC.
